resources.string: Icon to change style of the quote
Icon to change color of the quote
Fill your life with quotes, for they are the echoes of wisdom and the colors of inspiration that illuminate the canvas of our minds.
Icon to go to previous quote
Icon to go to next quote

Swipe for Quotes! 
Press Heart to favorite! 
Share any Quote by clicking on the share icon! 
Change the look with options on bottom right-side!
